description:
Kirito and Eugeo are on their way up the stairs of the Central Cathedral when they encounter two girls named Linel and Fizel. As they stand wondering what two children are doing there, letting their guard down, Linel and Fizel, who’d been hiding their true identities as Integrity Knights, paralyze them with poisoned swords. Now immobile, they`re dragged by the girls to where Fanatio Synthesis Two, a vice commander of the Integrity Knights, lies in wait.
Source: official website
